client_id_required: Client ID or email is required

booking_appointments.title: Booking appointments
booking_appointments.description: Reserve pantry visits from your dashboard.
steps: Select a time, add a client note for staff if needed, confirm the booking, and add it to your calendar.

rescheduling_or_canceling.title: Rescheduling or canceling
rescheduling_or_canceling.description: Change or cancel an existing booking.
steps: Click Reschedule or Cancel and follow prompts.
Use the email link to reschedule or cancel.

view_booking_history.title: View booking history
steps: Browse the list of previous and upcoming bookings.

manage_profile_and_password.title: Manage profile and password
manage_profile_and_password.description: Update contact information or change your password.
steps: Edit your information or notification preferences.

visit_counts_and_reminders.title: Visit counts and reminders
visit_counts_and_reminders.description: The dashboard shows monthly totals and upcoming reminders.

dashboard_tips.title: Dashboard tips
dashboard_tips.description: Review the tips shown on your first visit.

timesheets.title: Timesheets
timesheets.description: Record hours and submit pay periods.
steps: Open the Timesheets page from the profile menu.
Fill in hours for each day.

leave.title: Leave Management
steps: Open the Leave Management page from the profile menu.
Submit new leave requests with type and dates.
Review the status of your requests.

install_app.title: Install the app
install_app.description: Add the web app to your device.
steps: Click Install App when the button appears.
On iOS, open in Safari and use Add to Home Screen.

login.title: Login
login.description: Clients, staff, volunteers, and agencies sign in here with their client ID or email and password.
steps: Enter your client ID or email and password.

dashboard_tips.title: Dashboard tips
dashboard_tips.description: Review the tips shown on your first visit.

no_slots_available: No slots available. Please choose another date.
setup_link_sent: If the account exists, a setup link has been sent.
reset_link_sent: If the account exists, a reset link has been sent.
password_reset_instructions: Enter your email or client ID and select submit. You'll get an email with a link to reset your password.

profile_page.title: MJ Foodbank - User Profile
profile_page.name: Name:
profile_page.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
profile_page.phone_chars: Use only numbers, spaces, or dashes.
profile_page.password_requirements: Use at least 8 characters, including uppercase and lowercase letters and a symbol.
profile_page.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.
profile_page.password_number: Password must include uppercase and lowercase letters.

cancel_booking_question: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?
cancel_all_upcoming: Cancel all upcoming bookings in this series?
search_by_name_or_client_id: Search by name or client ID

error.personal_limit: Only one personal day per quarter is allowed

client_login_notice_id: Please use your client ID or email to login. If you don't know your client ID or don't have an account created by us, please email harvestpantry@mjfoodbank.org to get an account created.
client_login_notice_internal: Staff, volunteers, and agencies sign in here with their email.
client_login_notice_password: If your password is not working, please use the forgot password link below to set a new password.
client_login_notice_volunteer: Are you a volunteer looking to shop? Please contact harvestpantry@mjfoodbank.org to enable booking shopping in your volunteer account. After that please login to your volunteer account to book your shopping appointments.
client_login_notice_close: Close this modal to sign in.
incorrect_id_password: Incorrect ID or email or password

client.title: Welcome
client.body: Use Book Appointment to schedule visits. Your dashboard shows upcoming bookings.

volunteer.title: Welcome
volunteer.body: Tap Schedule to sign up for shifts. Install the app for faster access.
